div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 718 Stryme, 25 km. S of Comotini, Thrace, 1958 Burial: c. 350 B.C. (Bakalakis) Contents: 28 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: tetradr. Disposition: Athens BCH 1959, pp. 718-9, illus. (2) Bakalakis, Anaskaphe Strymes (Salonika, 1967), pp. 33, 132-40, illus.
